adept.common
Class Argument

java.lang.Object
  adept.common.Item
      adept.common.HltContent
          adept.common.Argument

public class Argument
extends HltContent

The Class Argument, which contains one or more Chunk objects along with their associated probabilities.

getBestArgument

public Chunk getBestArgument()
Gets the best argument.

Returns:
the best argument. If there are two chunks with the same level of confidence, the first one is returned.
